ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 12
ygData.msgSnippet: I am gonna start a new character on the teams PvP server when its up. Perhaps we should also all try and congregate to a single server as well, although PvP
ygData.messageBody:
I am gonna start a new character on the teams PvP server when its up.
Perhaps we should also all try and congregate to a single server as well,
although PvP teams may not be something you want. As in respect for a
guild, what should it be called? I do not think a name like GLBC should be
used. It should be something that maybe gay people might pick up on, but
nothing to obvious and fantasy based. As a suggestion, I think maybe a
name like the Rainbow warriors might be good although some of you may think
its obvious. Beleive it or not, most hetros do not know the significance
of the the rainbow yet. Or maybe some ancient word meaning same sex or
something like that.

-- Jinsu 11th level monk on bertelboxis
